appShortcutName: Timed Silence - Don't let your phone rattle you!
appDisplayName: Timed Silence - Don't let your phone rattle you!
description: An app that manages your phones volume. It will mute your phone for you! An app that manages your phones volume. It will mute your phone for you, so that you never get disturbed when doing important things! Time Create schedules for when your phone should be muted or loud Calendar Let your calendar manage the volume for you. Depending on events, your phone will be silent! Keywords If you have specific events, keywords will help you get the silence you need! Bluetooth When a bluetooth device connects, your phone can react to it! Sanity Check Just so that you don't miss anything important, we have a checkup that you can use to verify your settings!
